featured.text: An international team of researchers focused on a population of yellow-bellied sea snakes living near Costa Rica, where rain often does not fall for up to seven months out of the year.

other.text: Because yellow-bellied sea snakes usually spend all of their time far from land, rain is the animals’ only source of fresh water.

definition.zh_def: 一種顏色，介於綠色和橙色之間，通常與陽光和快樂相關。
definition.en_def: A color that is between green and orange, often associated with sunlight and happiness.
definition.example: The sun painted the sky a beautiful shade of yellow.
